nodes.text: A scomp link was an accessory that allowed an astromech droid or BD unit to plug into a computer via a socket. Also, Imperial droids such as the KX-series security droid had one. It consisted of an extendable arm with a rotating tip. The clone trooper CT-1409 "Echo" had his right arm replaced with a scomp link by the Techno Union after sustaining heavy injuries.
